item.description:
Hello Everyone... It has been a long yucky summer... It has been rain and more rain.. We have decided to plan a meetup and pray for no rain... It is September 14th on Sunday... at 1:30 at Matt's House... I can't believe we are heading into fall so soon.... I am looking forward to seeing all the new babies and new members... as usual.. bring a snack or drink to share... and if you have any questions please call me ... or email me at nhpugsrus@aol.com
641-3628...
item.how_to_find_us: Just Ask.... Where is the Pug Lady..

group.name: Manchester New Hampshire pug/small dog meet up group

item.name: Pug/Companion dog Get Together..
